text: @DeAnna4Congress China wouldn’t have released COVID-19 if Hillary were elected. Then again after 8 years of Obama the real powers that none of us can identify couldn’t allow a continuation of that. Hence the election of President Trump. I gotta hand it to them they’re all about chaos & balance.
